title: Spiced oat cookies
description: At last! A sugar-free cookie! Tender, oaty and gently spiced, you'll never miss the sugar.Each cookie provides 82 kcal, 1g protein, 7g carbohydrate (of which 0.5g sugars), 5.5g fat (of which 1g saturates), 1g fibre and 0.4g salt.
ingredients: 75g/3oz wholemeal flour, plus a little extra
75g/3oz baking spread, plus extra for greasing
